Viral! Polisi Pukul Sopir Ambulans yang Bawa Pasien Gegara Sirene
02 Nov 2019, 17:29 by Ahmad Arfah Fansuri
Jakarta - Video cekcok antara seorang oknum polisi dan sopir ambulans yang sedang membawa pasien viral di media sosial. Peristiwa tersebut terjadi di Jalan KF Tandean, Tebing Tinggi, Sumatera Utara (Sumut).
Dalam video yang viral, terlihat oknum polisi tersebut hendak mencabut kunci kendaraan. Namun digagalkan oleh sang sopir dengan mendorong polisi tersebut.
"Kami bawa pasien ini!" ujar sang sopir dan rekannya.
Oknum polisi ini kemudian malah emosional dan membalas dengan memukul sang sopir. Tak terima, sang sopir pun turun dari kendaraan. Dia menghampiri dan mendorong si oknum polisi. Dia dan rekannya lagi-lagi menegaskan bahwa mereka sedang membawa pasien di dalam ambulans tersebut.


Foto: Screenshot video

Informasi yang beredar, keributan tersebut terjadi pada Sabtu (2/11/2019) siang di wilayah Simpang Empat, Tebing Tinggi. Ambulans yang diberhentikan polisi itu seharusnya mengantarkan pasien dari RS Sri Pamela ke RSUD Kumpulan Pane, Tebing Tinggi.
Kapolres Tebing Tinggi AKBP Sunadi membenarkan kejadian itu. Menurutnya, kejadian berawal saat sang sopir ambulans menghidupkan sirene di jalan yang sedang macet, lalu terjadi kesalahpahaman. Namun dia tidak menjelaskan detail seperti apa kesalahpahaman yang dimaksud.
"Tadi di Jalan KF Tendean sedang macet. Sopir ambulans menghidupkan sirene dan di situlah terjadi kesalahpahaman dengan petugas kami," kata Sunadi.
Sunadi menyebut kedua belah pihak sudah dimintai klarifikasi terkait peristiwa tersebut. Polisi ingin kesalahpahaman tersebut diselesaikan dengan musyawarah.
"Kedua belah pihak sudah dipertemukan. Kami ingin menyelesaikannya dengan cara musyawarah," jelasnya.

Viral! Police Hit Ambulance Driver Bringing Gegara Siren Patients
02 Nov 2019, 17:29 by Ahmad Arfah Fansuri
Jakarta - A bickering video between a police officer and an ambulance driver carrying a viral patient on social media. The incident occurred on Jalan KF Tandean, Tebing Tinggi, North Sumatra (North Sumatra).
In a viral video, it appears that the police wanted to revoke the vehicle key. But it was thwarted by the driver by pushing the police.
"We brought this patient!" said the driver and his partner.
The police officer then became emotional and retaliated by hitting the driver. Do not accept, the driver got out of the vehicle. He approached and pushed the police officer. He and his colleagues again emphasized that they were carrying patients in the ambulance.


Photo: Video screenshot

Information circulating, the commotion occurred on Saturday (11/02/2019) afternoon in the Simpang Empat area, Tebing Tinggi. The ambulance that was dismissed by the police was supposed to deliver the patient from Sri Pamela Hospital to the Pane Collection Hospital, Tebing Tinggi.
Tebing Tinggi Police Chief Adjunct Senior Commissioner Sunadi confirmed the incident. According to him, the incident began when the ambulance driver turned on the siren on a jammed road, then a misunderstanding occurred. But he did not explain in detail what kind of misunderstanding was meant.
"Earlier on Jalan KF Tendean was jammed. An ambulance driver turned on the siren and there was a misunderstanding with our officers," Sunadi said.
Sunadi said that both parties had been asked for clarification regarding the incident. The police want the misunderstanding to be resolved by deliberation.
"The two sides have been reunited. We want to resolve it by way of consultation," he explained.

(zak / day)
